channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deep Water Salvage
channel.desc: Phil Risko's team at Northstar works fast to refloat a trawler that's been blown onto the shore of a national park in New Jersey; the team improvises to get it back to sea before it suffers further damage.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deep Water Salvage
channel.desc: At the mouth of the Suez Canal, Lino Arosemena and his crew have a monster repair job of removing and refitting a 20-ton propeller.

channel.title: High Arctic Haulers
channel.desc: Thick ice and storms threaten the Arctic Sealift before it reaches its first community.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Claw Hunters
channel.desc: Captain Greg Turner races a winter storm to save his stranded son, while Mack Kelley navigates unpredictable weather to keep family traditions alive.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Claw Hunters
channel.desc: Gail's hot streak comes with a target on her back; Greg faces the risks of hauling at night and Lex's issues stack up.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Claw Hunters
channel.desc: Joe Ray assesses damage in Maine following a winter storm, while restauranteur Susan Povich faces logistical challenges serving lobster in Brooklyn.
